content: if i can, i am amongst other things a published poet, that's got to be close to writing a song lyric, i won't tell you what the girl next to me said, she was harsh with the singer's heart on his sleeve, let me just go ahead and say he needs more time to process his thoughts and feelings, it was kind of like watching his diary, the art will come later. with all deference, wildcat soleil.
